channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: Allows to send a brightness value to the thing. If the thing is associated with more than one DMX channel, the values is used for ALL DMX channels.

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: Relative intensity of two adjacent DMX channels

channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: Allows to send a color value to the thing. If the thing is associated with more than one DMX channel, color will be re-use in 3-channel groups.

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Allows to switch a thing ON or OFF.

channel-type.label: Mute
channel-type.description: Mutes the DMX output of the Bridge
